name: Champion's Challenge
text: Play: Destroy each enemy creature except the most powerful enemy creature. Destroy each friendly creature except the most powerful friendly creature. Ready and fight with your remaining creature.

name: Iron Obelisk
text: Your opponentâ€™s keys cost +1 [AE] for each friendly damaged Brobnar creature.

name: Key Hammer
text: Play: If your opponent forged a key on their previous turn, unforge it. Your opponent gains 6[AE].

name: Pandemonium
text: Play: Each undamaged creature captures 1[AE] from its opponent.

name: Overlord Greking
text: After an enemy creature is destroyed fighting Overlord Greking, put that creature into play under your control.

name: Random Access Archives
text: Play: Archive the top card of your deck.

name: Brothers in Battle
text: Play: Choose a house. For the remainder of the turn, each friendly creature of that house may fight.

name: Smith
text: Play: Gain 2[AE] if you control more creatures than your opponent.

name: Cannon
text: Action: Deal 2[D] to a creature.

name: Headhunter

name: Mugwump

name: Pingle Who Annoys

name: Dance of Doom

text: Play: Destroy the 3 most powerful creatures.

name: Sacrificial Altar

text: Action: Shuffle your hand and discard pile into your deck.

name: Soul Snatcher
text: Each time a creature is destroyed, its owner gains 1[AE].

name: Master of 1
text: Reap: You may destroy a creature with 1 power.

name: Master of 3
text: Reap: You may destroy a creature with 3 power.

name: Pitlord
text: While Pitlord is in play, you must choose Dis as your active house.

name: Tolas
text: Each time a creature is destroyed, its opponent gains 1[AE].

name: Collar of Subordination
text: You control this creature.

name: Flame-Wreathed
text: This creature gets +2 power and gains hazardous 2.

name: Foggify
text: Play: Your opponent cannot use creatures to fight on their next turn.

name: Labwork
text: Play: Archive a card.

name: Crazy Killing Machine
text: Action: Discard the top card of each player's deck. For each of those cards, destroy a creature or artifact of that card's house, if able. If 2 cards are not destroyed as a result of this, destroy Crazy Killing Machine.

name: Pocket Universe
text:
You may spend [AE] on Pocket Universe when forging keys. 
Action: Move 1[AE] from your pool to Pocket Universe.

name: Brain Eater
text: After a creature is destroyed fighting Brain Eater, draw a card.

name: Dysania
text: Play: Your opponent discards each of their archived cards. You gain 1[AE] for each card discarded this way.

name: Deep Probe
text: Play: Choose a house.  Reveal your opponent's hand.  Discard each creature of that house revealed this way.

name: Hypnotic Command
text: Play: For each friendly Mars creature, choose an enemy creature to capture 1[AE] from their own side.

name: Key Abduction
text: Play: Return each Mars creature to its owner's hand.  Then, you may forge a key at +9[AE] current cost, reduced by 1[AE] for each card in your hand.

name: Martian Hounds
text: Play:  Choose a creature. For each damaged creature, give the chosen creature two +1 power counters.

name: Mass Abduction
text: Play: Put up to 3 damaged enemy creatures into your archives.  If any of these creatures leave your archives, they are put into their owner's hand instead.

name: Combat Pheromones
text: Omni: Sacrifice Combat Pheromones. You may use up to 2 other Mars cards this turn.

name: Swap Widget
text: Action: Return a friendly mars creature to your hand. If you do, put a Mars creature with a different name from your hand into play, then ready it.

name: Grommid
text:
You cannot play creatures.

text: Play: Discard the top card or your opponent's deck and reveal their hand. You gain 1[AE] for each card of the discarded card's house revealed in this way. Your opponent repeats the preceding effect on you.

text: Play: If your opponent has more [AE] than you, steal 1[AE]. Repeat this card's effect if your opponent still has more [AE] than you.

name: Booby Trap
text: Play: Deal 4[D] to a creature that is not on a flank with 2[D] splash.

name: Finishing Blow
text: Play: Destroy a damaged creature. If you do, steal 1[AE].

name: Ghostly Hand
text: Play: If your opponent has exactly 1[AE], steal it.

name: Hidden Stash
text: Play: Archive a card.

name: Imperial Traitor
text: Play: Look at your opponent's hand. You may choose and purge a Sanctum card in it.

name: Key of Darkness
text: Play: Forge a key at +6[AE] current cost.  If your opponent has no [AE], forge a key at +2[AE] current cost instead.

name: Lights Out
text: Play: Return 2 enemy creatures to their owner's hand.

name: Miasma
text: Play: You opponent skips the "forge a key" step on their next turn.

name: Nerve Blast
text: Play: Steal 1[AE]. If you do, deal 2[D] to a creature.

name: One Last Job
text: Play: Purge each friendly Shadows creature.  Steal 1[AE] for each creature purged this way.

name: Oubliette
text: Play: Purge a creature with power 3 or lower.

name: Pawn Sacrifice
text: Play: Sacrifice a friendly creature. If you do, deal 3[D] each to 2 creatures.

name: Poison Wave
text: Play: Deal 2[D] to each creature.

name: Relentless Whispers
text: Play: Deal 2[D] to a creature. If this damage destroys that creature, steal 1[AE].

name: Routine Job
text: Play: Steal 1[AE]. Then, steal 1[AE] for each copy of Routine Job in your discard pile.

name: Too Much to Protect
text: Play: Steal all but 6 of your opponent's [AE].

name: Treasure Map
text: Play: If you have not played any cards this turn, gain 3[AE]. For the remainder of this turn, you cannot play cards.

name: Customs Office
text: Your opponent must pay you 1[AE] in order to play an artifact.

name: Evasion Sigil
text: Before a creature fights, discard the top card of its controller's deck. If the discarded card is of the active house, exhaust that creature with no effect.

name: Longfused Mines
text: Omni: Sacrifice Longfused Mines. Deal 3[D] to each enemy creature not on a flank.

name: Masterplan
text:
Play: Put a card from your hand facedown beneath Masterplan.
Omni: Play the card beneath Masterplan. Sacrifice Masterplan.

name: Safe Place
text:
You may spend [AE] on Safe Place when forging keys.
Action:  Move 1[AE] from your pool to Safe Place.

name: Seeker Needle
text: Action: Deal 1[D] to a creature. If this damage destroys that creature, gain 1[AE].

name: Skeleton Key
text: Action: A friendly creature captures 1[AE].

name: Special Delivery
text: Omni: Sacrifice Special Delivery. Deal 3[D] to a flank creature. If this damage destroys that creature, purge it.

name: Speed Sigil
text: The first creature played each turn enters play ready.

name: Subtle Maul
text: Action: Your opponent discards a random card from their hand.

name: The Sting
text:
Skip your "forge a key" step. 
You get all [AE] spent by your opponent when forging keys. 
Action: Sacrifice The Sting.

name: Bad Penny
text: Destroyed: Return Bad Penny to your hand.

name: Bulleteye
text: Reap: Destroy a flank creature.

name: Carlo Phantom
text: Each time you play an artifact, steal 1[AE].

name: Faygin
text: Reap: Return an Urchin from play or from your discard pile to your hand.

name: Mack the Knife
text:
You may use Mack the Knife as if it belonged to the active house.

name: Nexus
text: Reap: Use an opponent's artifact as if it were yours.

text: Action: Steal 1[AE].

name: Dodger

name: Selwyn the Fence
text: Fight/Reap: Move 1[AE] from one your cards to your pool.

name: Shadow Self
text: Shadow Self deals no damage when fighting. Damage dealt to non-Specter neighbors is dealt to Shadow Self instead.

name: Silvertooth
text: Silvertooth enters play ready.

name: Smiling Ruth
text: Reap: If you forged a key this turn, take control of an enemy flank creature.

name: Sneklifter
text: Play: Take control of an enemy artifact. While under your control, if it does not belong to one of your three houses, it is considered to be of house Shadows.

name: Umbra
text: Fight: Steal 1[AE].

name: Urchin

name: Duskrunner

name: Ring of Invisibility

name: Silent Dagger
text: This creature gains, "Reap: Deal 4[D] to a flank creature."

name: Cooperative Hunting
text: Play: Deal 1[D] for each friendly creature in play.  You may divide this damage among any number of creatures.

name: Curiosity
text: Play: Destroy each Scientist creature.

name: Fertility Chant
text: Play: Your opponent gains 2[AE].

name: Fogbank
text: Play: Your opponent cannot use creatures to fight on their next turn.

name: Full Moon
text: Play: For the remainder of the turn, gain 1[AE] each time you play a creature.

name: Grasping Vines
text: Play: Return up to 3 artifacts to their owners' hand.

name: Key Charge
text: Play: Lose 1[AE]. If you do, you may forge a key at current cost.

name: Lifeweb
text: Play: If your opponent played 3 or more creatures on their previous turn, steal 2[AE].

name: Lost in the Woods
text: Play: Choose 2 friendly and 2 enemy creatures.  Shuffle each chosen creature into its owner's deck.

name: Mimicry

name: Nature's Call
text: Play: Return up to 3 creatures to their owners' hands.

name: Nocturnal Maneuver
text: Play: Exhaust up to 3 creatures.

name: Perilous Wild
text: Play: Destroy each elusive creature.

name: Regrowth
text: Play: Return a creature from your discard pile to your hand.

name: Save the Pack
text: Play: Destroy each damaged creature. Gain 1 chain.

name: Scout
text: Play: For the remainder of the turn, up to 2 friendly creatures gain skirmish. Then, fight with those creatures one at a time.

name: Stampede
text: Play: If you used 3 or more creatures this turn, steal 2[AE].

name: The Common Cold
text: Play: Deal 1[D] to each creature. You may destroy all Mars creatures.

name: Troop Call
text: Play: Return each friendly Niffle creature from your discard pile and from play to your hand.

name: Vigor
text: Play: Heal up to 3 damage from a creature. If you healed 3 damage, gain 1[AE].

name: Word of Returning
text: Play: Deal 1[D] to each enemy creature for each A on it. Return all A on those creatures to your pool.

name: Bear Flute
text: Action: Fully heal an Ancient Bear. If there are no Ancient Bears in play, search your deck and discard pile and put each Ancient Bear from them into your hand. If you do, shuffle your discard pile into your deck.

name: Nepenthe Seed
text: Omni: Sacrifice Nepenthe Seed.  Return a card from your discard pile to your hand.

name: Ritual of Balance
text: Action: If your opponent has 6[AE] or more, steal 1[AE].

name: Ritual of the Hunt
text: Omni: Sacrifice Ritual of the Hunt. For the remainder of the turn, you may use friendly Untamed creatures.

name: World Tree

name: Bigtwig
text:
Bigtwig can only fight stunned creatures.
